pros: Fun job and great team support. Perfecto for students

pros: Flexible hours, interesting fun work, good team
cons: a bit unorganized , some miscommunications or lack of communication happens.

review_title: An opportunity to see if you like teaching
pros: You are free to prepare your lessons however you see fit (given a few guidelines). This is a great opportunity to research and learn by yourself. In case of problems with the schools you work at, Fusion Jeunesse provides good support.
cons: For the artificial intelligence program, there was a lack of reference materials when it came to prepare in-class activities.

review_title: Great Place To Work For University/College Students

pros: Flexible Schedule, Supportive Staff, Great Experience
cons: There are not really any downsides

pros: Accommodates your schedule and management is very supportive
cons: No space for extra hours if you need some

review_title: Introduce kids aged 6 to 10 to robotics
pros: You get to work as much as you want. You are paid for every thing you do work related ( at the schools or at home)
cons: No cons ( except if you do not like kids)
